snippet: The University of Oregon agreed to pay $800,000 to settle a lawsuit brought by a student who said she was sexually assaulted last year by three basketball players.
abstract: University of Oregon settles lawsuit brought by woman who says she was sexually abused by three of school's basketball players; will pay $800,000 and waive woman's tuition, housing and student fees for four years; university will also change policy regarding disciplinary history of transfer applicants.
lead_paragraph: The University of Oregon agreed to pay $800,000 to settle a lawsuit brought by a student who said she was sexually assaulted last year by three basketball players.

headline.main: Oregon Settles Lawsuit Over Sexual Assault Allegations
